attributes.title: Glitchy
attributes.review: I honestly had the highest expectations for this app!! More than any other app Iâ€™ve ever downloaded!! And it was just horrible! Not only did it glitch out, crash my phone, delete all my pictures, use all my data, change my passwords, eat all my food and push my grandmother down the steps; it was also telling me false information!! Saying how the Orange man in office will make a good president! For a news app this is simply outrageous and I canâ€™t believe youâ€™d keep such an app in the store. Please delete this Apple!!! I expected much better!! :((
